001/**  Creates centralized object for order item properties
002 * @author Shruti Oruganti
003 */
004package src.model;
005
006public class orderItem {
007    private product product;
008    private int iceLevel = -1;   // -1 = not selected
009    private int sugarLevel = -1;
010
011    /**
012     * Creates order item object with product
013     * @param product - the product that is the item to be ordered
014     */
015    public orderItem(product product) {
016        this.product = product;
017    }
018
019    /**
020     * Gets the product which is the item being ordered
021     * @return - returns the product
022     */
023    public product getProduct() { return product; }
024
025    // Ice & Sugar
026
027    /**
028     * Gets the ice level of the drink for the order
029     * @return - returns the ice level
030     */
031    public int getIceLevel() { return iceLevel; }
032
033    /**
034     * Sets the ice level of the drink for the order
035     * @param iceLevel - the ice level the customer wants the drink to have
036     */
037    public void setIceLevel(int iceLevel) { this.iceLevel = iceLevel; }
038
039    /**
040     * Gets the sugar level of the drink
041     * @return - returns the sugar level of the drink
042     */
043    public int getSugarLevel() { return sugarLevel; }
044
045    /**
046     * Sets the sugar level of the drink
047     * @param sugarLevel - the sugar level the customer wants the drink to have
048     */
049    public void setSugarLevel(int sugarLevel) { this.sugarLevel = sugarLevel; }
050
051    // Total subtotal
052    /**
053     * Gets the price of the order item
054     * @return - returns the price of the product
055     */
056    public double getPrice() {
057        double price = product.getPrice();
058        return price;
059    }
060}
